paragraphs.content: Verily, thus saith the Lord unto you concerning the Apocrypha—There are many things contained therein that are true, and it is mostly translated correctly;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Verily, thus saith the Lord unto you concerning the Apocrypha—There are many things contained therein that are true, and it is mostly translated correctly;

paragraphs.content: There are many things contained therein that are not true, which are interpolations by the hands of men.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There are many things contained therein that are not true, which are interpolations by the hands of men.

paragraphs.content: Verily, I say unto you, that it is not needful that the Apocrypha should be translated.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Verily, I say unto you, that it is not needful that the Apocrypha should be translated.

paragraphs.content: Therefore, whoso readeth it, let him understand, for the Spirit manifesteth truth;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore, whoso readeth it, let him understand, for the Spirit manifesteth truth;

paragraphs.content: And whoso is enlightened by the Spirit shall obtain benefit therefrom;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whoso is enlightened by the Spirit shall obtain benefit therefrom;

paragraphs.content: And whoso receiveth not by the Spirit, cannot be benefited. Therefore it is not needful that it should be translated. Amen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whoso receiveth not by the Spirit, cannot be benefited. Therefore it is not needful that it should be translated. Amen.
